#summary Skin Properties used by mvCentral

= Introduction =

The following lists all the skin properties set within mvCentral and available to skinners. 

Currently this is just a list, will clean up and create a full skinners guide over the next few days.


= Main GUI Propities =

|| #itemcount || number items on facade||
|| #mvCentral.Settings.HomeScreenName || Plugin Name||
|| #mvCentral.TotalArtists || Total number of Artits in DB||
|| #mvCentral.TotalVideos || Total Number of Videos in DB||
|| #mvCentral.Hierachy || Set to the current view, Atrists, Videos, Playlist etc||
|| #mvCentral.Itemcount.Text || Deprecated - replaced by #itemtype||
|| #mvCentral.ArtistView || Set to 'true' if on Artist view||
|| #mvCentral.TrackView || Set to 'true' if on Videos view ||
|| #mvCentral.ArtistBio || The cleaned Artist Bio retived from the selected Provider ||
|| #mvCentral.ArtistName || The current Artist for the selected object ||
|| #mvCentral.ArtistImg || Full path to the primary Artist Image ||
|| #mvCentral.VideosByArtist || Number Music Videos for selected Artist ||
|| #mvCentral.ArtistTracksRuntime || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.ArtistGenre || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.LocalMedia.videoresolution || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.LocalMedia.videoaspectratio || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.LocalMedia.videocodec || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.LocalMedia.audiocodec || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.LocalMedia.audiochannels || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.LocalMedia.audio || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.VideoImg || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.TrackInfo || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.Duration || TBS ||
|| #mvCentral.Backdrop || TBS ||
|| mvCentral.Coverart || TBS ||
|| #MusicVids.Sort || TBS ||
